(Simplified: 圹)
Chinese Definition:
①墓穴，亦指墳墓：壙穴。打壙。
②曠野。

Original meaning 本义: Meaning tomb or prairie.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 壙穴 kuàng xué (tomb)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 塹穴也一曰大也從土廣聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 壙 from potters-clay 土 tǔ and phonetic building (广)廣 guǎng simp 圹.

壙字的基本解释

壙
kuàng
见“圹”。

壙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuàng］
［《廣韻》苦謗切，去宕，溪。］
“圹1”的繁体字。
(1)墓穴。
(2)指开掘墓地。
(3)原野。
(4)荒废。
(5)久远。

壙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壙； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页241第25
【集韻】【韻會】?苦晃切，音懭。竁也，墓穴也。【禮·檀弓】弔于葬者必執引，若從柩及壙，皆執紼。　又壙埌，原野空廓貌。【賈誼·新書】天下壙壙，一人有之。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦謗切。同曠。廣?懬曠壙古通。

壙字的源字形

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kuàng］
["Guangyun" bitterly slander, go to Dang, Xi. ]
"圹1" in traditional characters.
(1) Tomb.
(2) Refers to the excavation of a cemetery.
(3) The wilderness.
(4) Wasted.
(5) For a long time.
tomb
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　圹; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 241-25
[Jiyun] [Rhyme]? Hard to cut, sound stunned. The condyles are also the tombs. 【Ritual·Tan Bow】Hanging from the funeral, one must hold the lead, if from the chute and 圹, both hold on.　Yeah, the wilderness is empty. 【Jia Yi·New Book】Kuo Kuo in the world, one person owns it.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Hard to slander. Tong Kuang. Guang? Chuan Kuang Kuo Tong.
